name: Carl's Tea Party
description:
Carl the spider is having some of his friends over for a tea party. This is fine. He planned this it should be fine...

It most definitely is not fine.

Carl the spider suffers from anxiety attacks. Help him manage his anxiety and have a good time with his friends as they come over for tea.

Carl's tea party is a visual novel made for Mini Jam 124: Warmth - itch.io. 

Controls: Use the mouse to select dialog options and to fill teacups when prompted to.

Content Warnings: 

ANXIETY: This game deals with a spider who suffers from anxiety.  If this is a trigger for you, please keep in mind the quit button is always a way out. It is just a game; you don't need to worry about Carl.

SPIDERS: This game has spiders.  If you are scared of spiders, you might want to avoid this game.  We don't have any jump scares, but it will have a lot of spiders as main characters throughout the game.  Keep that in mind before playing.

TEAPOTS: This game has a potentially scary tea pot in it.  We are not responsible if you develop a fear of tea pots from playing our game.
